sqlMap.select: select product_num,hw_product_code,product_name,product_divide,product_note,product_posesion,product_type,product_quantity,product_in,product_out,product_register_day,product_rona_day,product_return_day from (select product_num,hw_product_code,product_name,product_divide,product_note,product_posesion,product_type,product_quantity,product_in,product_out,product_register_day,product_rona_day,product_return_day,rownum r from (select product_num,hw_product_code,product_name,product_divide,product_note,product_posesion,product_type,product_quantity,product_in,product_out,product_register_day,product_rona_day,product_return_day from hw_product order by product_num desc) ) where r >= #start# and r <= #end#
